summary: Health symptoms tracker: stop feeling sick and develop health habits
recentChanges: Don't just keep track of your life. Improve your health!
comments: Would be great if the app gave the option to track the time along with the date of the symptom. The time of day is just as important as the date itself and a pretty standard question providers ask when asking patients about their symptoms. I have to keep a time and date log while wearing a heart monitor so they can correlate the two but I don't see how to do that. I will be requesting a refund.

The app is quite good but you need to add more functions and more details, add stuff that would keep your customers motivated to use it. E.g if you use the app and enter data you have an animal that grows as you enter data every day. Once that animal grows you get another animal or plant or a garden or something that you'd care for while caring for yourself.
Quite impressed but the calendar could do with improvement, need to be able to set a time for items and have a repeat options. But all in all it seems pretty good.
Weird unintuitive interface, doesn't allow you to select more than 1 item e.g. when I add activity it deselect mood and it won't generate a list of items you've selected. Doesn't make any sense.

after playing with the app a bit more I'm going to have to pause in my use. I love the simplistic way of checking off symptoms as I have them and the ability to find correlations. how ever this would be helpful for gathering the frequency of my symptoms. I'm currently using the flexable journal app if that app would correlate like yours with more flexability in what and how you can correlate and link it would be an amazing program

title: Yummly
description:
Yummly is your smart cooking sidekick, offering personalized guidance every step of the way. From recipe recommendations just for you, to handy tools and helpful videos, Yummly has everything you need to improve life in the kitchen. Experience what millions are enjoying on the web, free on your Android device.

‚òÖ 2 million + recipes from the best of the best üë®‚Äçüç≥üë©‚Äçüç≥ü•á

An endless supply of recipes to fuel your next cooking adventure from Yummly‚Äôs test kitchen and top sites like AllRecipes, Epicurious, Food52 to smaller food blogs and everything in between. Every week, thousands of new recipes are added to Yummly for you to discover and Yum. 

‚òÖ Discover recipe recommendations, just for you üçΩÔ∏è 

Set up your taste and nutrition preferences and we‚Äôll only serve up recipes that match. As you use Yummly, like magic, it learns about your likes (and don‚Äôt likes). Yummly will provide you with food recipe recommendations every day that you are sure to love. In a bit of a food rut? Let Yummly help you out with a cornucopia of tasty suggestions for cooking. The more you Yum, the better it gets! 

‚òÖ Step-by-step guided recipes üé¨‚è≤üç¥

Let Yummly do the thinking for you with our step-by-step recipes, including video tutorials, timers, and more handy tools to make cooking a breeze. 

‚òÖ Collect, save, and organize your favorites üíæ

Saving your favorite recipes couldn‚Äôt be easier. With the simple tap of a ‚ÄúYum‚Äù button, your faves are stashed for safekeeping in a digital recipe box. Once saved, create collections for easy organization and viewing when cooking and grocery shopping.

‚òÖ Personalized diets & allergies üçâüçäüå∂Ô∏èüççü•ëüçì

Are you eating vegan, vegetarian, paleo, or gluten free? Do you have a food allergy to dairy, peanuts, or seafood? Simply hate cilantro? Yummly has you covered! We scour recipes from across the web and automatically filter out recipes based on your tastes, allergies, and diets.  

‚òÖ The most powerful way to search for recipes üîç

Why waste time sifting through the wrong recipes? Our unique search filters allow you to find the perfect recipe. Filter by cuisine, nutrition requirements (for calories, carbs, fat, or cholesterol), cook time, technique, and more. 

‚òÖ Recipe scheduling for easy meal planning üìÖ‚è∞
Schedule a recipe to the exact time you want to eat and it's instantly added to your calendar. You'll even get a gentle nudge when it's time to start cooking.

‚òÖ Add entire recipes to your grocery shopping list üóíÔ∏èüõí

With one click you can add a full recipe to your shopping list. Yummly automatically categorizes your shopping list by both aisles and recipes to make your trip to the grocery store a snap. 

‚òÖUse voice commands to keep your screen clean
Navigate hands-free through our step-by-step Guided Recipes with Yummly Voice Control. Just say "Hey Yummly" to activate voice commands so you can move through recipe steps, see ingredients, start timers and more.

Download the free Yummly app today. Let‚Äôs get cookin‚Äô!

CA residents - Do Not Sell My Personal Information: https://www.yummly.com/do-not-sell-my-info

summary: The most personal recipe app. Start cooking recipes and food you want now.
recentChanges: By popular request: Ambient temperature will now display when you‚Äôre cooking with Yummly Smart Thermometer. + A Yum Tip: Turn up the heat and dry your meat with paper towels before searing ‚Äî it‚Äôs a surefire way to brown it more perfectly.
comments: This app used to be brilliant, inspiring and easy to use. The updates and new features are time consuming and creatively crippling. Now to find a simple recipe you have to put in all the ingredients you have and even then the search results are sadly limited. Like hello, I'm looking for a recipe to fit the couple of ingredients I want to use up and am *going to buy the other stuff I need*.I've used this app for years but it's extremely unhelpful now, will be looking for an alternative.

App is pretty decent really like the way to have the pantry ready recipies section available. Wish you could add corresponding cookware, where you could add more types of recipes that require different types of tools and cookware. not everyone has a blender or cupcake pans available to them to make some recipes. it'd be nice for unexperienced cooks to have that option to know what to use to cook their food with.

I do not like how you have to tap a button to get directions. I wish they were just done at the bottom of the recipe. I'm also having trouble getting the directions, it just says something like how they're having technical issues. I do really like how organized things are! And how aesthetically pleasing the app is

This app is basically a search engine for cooking; food & recipes. It also includes useful features for tailored results, building recipe lists and of your in the right place, making a shopping list - although the auto-shopping features will not not work for me in Adelaide, South Australia.

I love this app. Been a long-time Pinterest user, but there's just too much other stuff on Pinterest and I like the fact that I can find what I want and not have all the other junk come up too. Great job!

title: Foodvisor: Calorie Counter, Food Diary & Diet Plan
description:
Foodvisor is a nutrition coach that will help you eat healthier and reach your goal. Just snap a picture of your meal and you will receive its nutrition facts! Regain control over your diet and learn to make better food choices.

Whether you‚Äôre looking to get healthier, lose weight, tone your body, or take on a new diet; Foodvisor will help you develop healthier habits allowing you to achieve your goal! 


‚óÜ THE EASIEST WAY TO TRACK YOUR DIET ‚óÜ  

‚Ä¢ Take a photo of your meal and receive its nutrition facts (i.e. calories, proteins, carbs, fats, fibers, cholesterol, etc).
‚Ä¢ Scan barcodes to track and log your food easily. 
‚Ä¢ Create custom meals and save your favorite meals.

‚óÜ REACH YOUR HEALTH GOALS ‚óÜ

‚Ä¢ Set a goal: You can choose to lose weight, gain weight, maintain your weight, establish a healthy balance to your life and much more! 
‚Ä¢ Log your activities and see how many calories you've burned
‚Ä¢ Track your weight, monitor your progress and receive guidance to achieve your health goals.


Download Foodvisor and start living a healthier and happier life today! 


You need to have version 6 of Android to download Foodvisor.

summary: Lose weight & eat healthier easily. Just snap a picture and get nutrition facts!
recentChanges:
Introducing our new app version, with super exciting new features such as:
- A new design of the search food page, with food categories
- A new feature to enter your own custom food
- The possibility to add new barcodes and to edit the barcodes you scan üñã
- New recipes (with our partner Quitoque) üç≥
The possibility to edit your macronutritinients repartition if you're Premium üéâ
Any questions? Any problems? Or ideas for new features? Send us an email to support@foodvisor.io
comments: Just begun using it I like the history where you can just pick a previous meal, so you don't need to input each meal. I like it great so far. Think the portions need to be more flexible as 1 serving of raw food like sliced onions hard to judge if it's a portion or not. Just a small gripe tho
Great, would recommend. Only problem is the icon is not super sharp, and might be out of date for the new icon shape design Google updated. Other than that, it looks good and polished within the app

Great data base, but few bugs. Like the barcode that won't work until rebooting the app and the today's planning that get all empty when starting the app. Also it's just an historic of my meals, it would be great to prepare them in advance for the coming weeks.

I'm pretty new to be rating this app, but I like what it is bringing to the table. I'm using the premium version and thought the price was low enough to pick up the extra features of menus and advice. Content is very helpful. Taking a photo and getting feedback is innovative and I think will be stronger as more people use. Having issues with font size in database being a bit large to see full descriptions. Seeing a lot of potential!

Unless you're sure you want to pay for the whole year, go ahead with the supposedly "7-day Free trial". They will charge you at the moment of the subscription to the trial. I contacted Foodvisor support and Play Google, and neither validated my complaint. It is highly deceiving for users to tell they can try the app but charge them the full amount right away. I don't know how Google allows this type of practice.

title: GutIT
description:
Grocery shopping can be tricky sometimes, especially if you're allergic to certain food items. If you have a particular diet, or you find yourself wondering is it gluten-free? With this app, you can scan nutritional information in seconds and check whether it is safe to consume or not. 

Currently, the app supports for people who suffer from Celiac disease.

comments: Amazing application ! Just a scan can solve the buying problem
Need really good light to use this app. Free and easy to use
It is really helpful and need for other allergies
My daughter is celiac and this app has made food shopping for her so easy !
It's very useful app for knowledge of foods. And amazing .

title: Healthily by Your.MD - Self-Care & Health Journal
description:
Healthily by Your.MD is the self-care app. Decide when to see a doctor, manage your wellbeing step-by-step, discover vetted health products and services, and find clear, trusted information on 100s of conditions, including coronavirus (COVID-19).

**Questions about coronavirus? Find the latest information and check your risk with Healthily**

Did you know most visits to the doctor are for issues you can treat yourself? To do that, you need safe, reliable information to help you understand how you‚Äôre feeling, and what to do next.

Healthily by Your.MD is the first self-care app registered as a Class I Medical Device ‚Äì bringing you the expertise you need, in a way you can use every day.  

Join millions of people already taking care of their health with Healthily. 

HOW IT WORKS

ASSESS: Our friendly chatbot helps you decide if you need to see a doctor. Tell it how you feel and its Augmented Intelligence recommends the best next steps for your symptoms ‚Äì including self-care for issues you can treat at home. 

LEARN: Our Health Library, sourced mostly from the UK‚Äôs National Health Service, completed by our own medical team, is the simplest, safest and most comprehensive in the world. Includes the up-to-date guidance and information on coronavirus (COVID-19). 

TRACK: Our user-friendly, secure health journal and symptom trackers help you keep track of your health and store notes, in complete privacy. 

DISCOVER: We‚Äôve created OneStop Health‚Ñ¢ Marketplace, the first vetted directory of healthcare products and services offered by other companies. So you can speak to a doctor, find a medicine or discover the best apps for you.

Used every day or when you need them, our symptom trackers, health journal and health library make self-care simple, particularly during the coronavirus outbreak (COVID-19).

YOUR SAFETY IS OUR No.1 PRIORITY

Healthily Self-Care Health Assistant and Health Journal is classified as a Class I Medical Device registered with the Medicines and Healthcare products Regulatory Agency (MHRA) and is CE accredited, which means that our services comply with European Union Medical Device legislation.

All our health and self-care content is reviewed and approved by our team of in-house doctors who are supervised by our Clinical Advisory Board, made up of world-renowned medical experts.

As your personal health assistant, we take your security seriously. Our self-assessment tool, symptoms tracker and health journal have the ePrivacy seal of approval, so you can be confident your data is private and protected.

WE‚ÄôVE GOT YOU COVERED
We help you find self-care information on a huge range of health conditions including:

‚Ä¢ Coronavirus (Covid-19)
‚Ä¢ Common cold
‚Ä¢ Throat irritation
‚Ä¢ Influenza / Flu
‚Ä¢ Sprains and strains
‚Ä¢ Hay fever
‚Ä¢ Thrush
‚Ä¢ Headaches




(*) SAFE USE
If you‚Äôre generally healthy and don‚Äôt suffer from any chronic or rare medical conditions, we can help identify less-serious conditions you can manage yourself and guide you on whether to see a doctor. Your.MD cannot consider all the information a doctor can and is not able to identify all conditions or symptoms. Your.MD does not provide diagnosis or medical advice.

Your.MD cannot be used for information about babies, children aged 15 and younger, pregnant women, people on immunosuppressive treatment, and people with complex or long-term conditions.

For more information read Your.MD Terms of Service and Safe Use Instructions.

recentChanges:
Now you can find your way to better health ‚Äì faster.

INTRODUCING:

- WITH THE NEW ‚ÄòPLUS‚Äô: just tap ‚Äò+‚Äô to instantly add a health tracker, or a note.
comments: This App is really awesome! And is so much help and helpful to motivate you and pay more attention to yourself and how your feeling. It's like a friend thats there to help you! Thank you so much it has been so helpful!

I have a headache today and app sent me almost strait to the doctor as a serious issue. Not sure one of headache is that serious and reason might be any. Also I would welcome dark version (theme) of the app. Headache and white screen is not good.
Very easy to use. Simple layout and bold lettering.
This is a great app that offers Daily insights, a helpful assistant, and a Symptom tracker, & a Health Journal where you can annotate anything you feel may be of relevance later. I love it!
It really helps to journal how I'm feeling so I can look back when I need to. Very handy & helpful app.

title: Fertility Friend Ovulation App
description:
Fertility Friend is an accurate and detailed fertility tracker. Fertility Friend creates an exclusive fertility chart and ovulation calendar with personalized trying to conceive tips and analysis. 

Track your period and other fertility signs (basal body temperature/BBT, cervical fluid, symptoms, etc). Fertility Friend will alert you to your ovulation date and the best days to conceive and offer personal, timely insights.

Fertility Friend will quickly teach you how to track your fertility signs, show you what they mean and display your ovulation and fertile days on a calendar and a fertility chart. 

Fertility Friend includes extensive education, advanced tools and tips to give you the knowledge you need to feel confident and empowered. 

Once pregnant you can follow your pregnancy on the integrated Pregnancy Tracker.

Fertility Friend‚Äôs fertility tracker is the perfect complement to the FertilityFriend.com website.

Experience matters: 
The most sophisticated, accurate and comprehensive analysis of your fertility signs.

    * Color coded fertility calendar: Your period, fertile days, ovulation and more at a glance.
    * Fully integrated with the FertilityFriend.com website. Benefit from accurate ovulation prediction, automatic ovulation detection, BBT chart pattern analysis and an extensive set of features on the web site. No sync or upload of data required.
    * Optional short passcode to protect your fertility tracker App from unwanted attention.
    * Full data entry for fertility tracker including period, basal body temperature (BBT), cervical fluid, daily notes, your custom symptoms, meds, default data and much more...
    * Menstrual cycle statistics- convenient record of your cycle length, period dates, ovulation dates, cycle phase lengths, and symptoms
    * Offline data entry and review when Internet access is not available.
    * Optional Alarm to remind you of your data entry, morning basal body temperature (BBT).
    * Extensive educational resources: Educational videos, tutorials, quizzes and eBook.   
    * Optional Widget: Create your own graphical fertility tracker and display it on your home screen.
    * Weight Chart & Tracker
    *Gallery of ovulation charts- hundreds of thousands of fertility charts, see real BBT chart patterns 
    *Fertility chart sharing page (optional)
    *BBT chart creation and coverline
    *Automatic ovulation detection based on your own fertility signs.
*use Fertility Friend‚Äôs advanced (default) accurate ovulation detector or choose ovulation detection based on the Fertility Awareness Method (FAM)
*Fertility chart interpretation games
    

Premium Features available via in-App membership purchase:
    * Advanced data analysis tools to monitor your cycles, basal body temperature (BBT) pattern and fertility data
    * Vibrant community with enhanced privacy
    *Pregnancy Monitor
    * Pregnancy Tracker: once pregnant, use the pregnancy tracker to follow your pregnancy.
   

Permission Details:

Internet access: This App communicates with FertilityFriend.com to store data and retrieve analysis.

Photo/Media/Files: The App includes a forum where you can attach photos to your posts.
This permission is also needed to allow you to move the App to the SD card if you are short of storage.

Support, Bug Reports & Suggestions:
http://FertilityFriend.com/contact.html

IMPORTANT LIMITATIONS: This calendar uses only approximate prediction and cannot be used to schedule procedures, avoid pregnancy or anything where more accuracy would be required. It is intended for educational use only. Use at your own risk. Please consult your healthcare provider for any health concern.

recentChanges: In this version: fixed the hardware back button feature.
comments: Good feature set, but pretty much useless for anything except tracking period and symptoms if you are not temping: even with clear cervical fluid patterns, it will not estimate when ovulation happened on a particular past month. Edit: thank you for your quick answer! Yes, I know cervical fluid is not enough information to compute the ovulation day, but I would expect a sort of estimate like "based on your inputs, ovulation might have happened on CD x".

Have used it for years. Used it for 2 of my babies so far. It helps me know where I am in my cycle. I can compare my current cycles from cycles years ago. It all stays in the app for recording purposes.
The app is suddenly not working for me... Got a networking issue in the app, but I can connect to the Web site directly. Not sure what went wrong.
Please what's the problem with app network these days? Overall a very great app so far.

What a terrible app. There's more screen space dedicated to premium pushing ads than the chart! It continiously tells me I might be pregnant, even in the middle of my period (and, as someone going through fertility treatment, it's made me cry twice because the ads push that I would be pregnant if I had just bought premium), it has no algorithm to adapt to cycles and is stuck on an insane 20 day cycle, and the UI hasn't been updated since the 90s.

title: INCI Beauty - Analysis of cosmetic products
description:
INCI Beauty allows you to analyze the composition of cosmetic products simply, quickly and free of charge!

The app that accompanies you everywhere...

Whether you're at home or in-store, we have thousands of references to give you the best details of what your cosmetics contain (or those you plan to buy).

INCI Beauty allows you to:

‚Ä¢ Discover the detailed composition of a product by scanning its barcode or searching for it using its name or brand. It is not in our database yet? Create a user account to add product photos and ingredients to receive analysis of its composition.
‚Ä¢ Find a cleaner alternative to products whose rating does not satisfy you.
‚Ä¢ Watch the offers of different merchants to buy the product you like.
‚Ä¢ Fill in your restrictions to exclude a family of unwanted ingredients.
‚Ä¢ View your search history and tag products as favourites to find them more easily when you make future purchases.
‚Ä¢ Share your opinion with the community with the Like/Dislike button or by writing a comment.

With your user account, you can:

‚Ä¢ Choose your avatar, add a bio, indicate your Instagram, Facebook and Twitter profiles.
‚Ä¢ See the products you've added comments on.
‚Ä¢ Follow users and view their comments.

Become a contributor!

Help the INCI Beauty community by filling in your ingredients or those of another user to speed up the analysis of your products awaiting processing => https://open.incibeauty.com

How are rating calculated?

Each component is rated according to its level of danger or its potentially undesirable effects on humans and nature... All this thanks to a color code, symbolized by a flower, ranging from green to red.

SIGMA and Touslesprix.com

At the end of 2017, two engineering students from the SIGMA chemistry school in Clermont-Ferrand took part in the INCI Beauty project. Since November 2018, a chemical engineer has joined us and gives us his scientific support to give you the best guidance on the function of INCI ingredients, in order to offer consistent rating and objective results, regardless of any commercial interest.

Contact us

If you have any question or suggestion, please contact us at : contact@incibeauty.com

recentChanges:
‚Ä¢ Access to more information about the products (Reserved for beta testers).
‚Ä¢ Added the possibility to delete your account from the application.
comments: Great app! Helped me a lot. The only thing I dislike is that I can't find a lot of products, but still, there is enough to find an alternative :)

The app is great and surprisingly I could find many kbeauty products in the database. Only downside being that when I add a product to the database I can only do so using the camera to take a photo I cannot upload the image from my gallery which makes it troublesome especially with kbeauty products that do not show ingredient list in English on the actual product

Please insert a ingredient searching option, where i can copy-paste the ingredient list and you can scan and give me the solution about which ingredient is pore clogging and which is not. The biggest complain about your app is that it does not cover all the products, and i have faced the same problems. By checking the ingredients, you dont need to cover or include all the products, just check their ingredients.

I'm relatively new to the app and I find it really useful. It really helped me defining a proper skincare routine. The interface is easy, has potential if some features can be improved. For instance, I agree with a previous review about being able to create specific lists of products instead of adding it as favourites because I like to try new products and my skincare needs can change depending on the seasons (I have mixed skin).

This app is awesome. It helped me realize how much bad stuff I put on my skin and helped me choose better ones. Finally I don't feel lost when I look at ingredients. The lot of chemicals can be really confusing and it's hard to decide which ones are good or bad. Now I just take my phone and check them. Thank you.

title: Stupid Simple Macros IIFYM Tracker
description:
Welcome to the easiest diet you've ever tried. Eat whatever you want, as long as it fits with your food macro plan it's part of your diet! Stupid Simple Macros is the most efficient way ever to track your macro-nutrients and help you bulk up, lose weight, or do both at the same time!

Why count macros vs what you do on every other diet? Counting macros is one of the easiest ways to reach your fitness goals by simply tracking your fat, protein, and carb levels. Stupid Simple Macros makes tracking these macros super easy. And best of all, you set your own macros levels, so you can eat whatever you want as long as you reach your daily macros! If it fits your macros ("IIFYM") you can eat it!

Or you can customize your food grid for a Whole Foods Plant Based diet (WFPB) and see what a different it makes in your life.

FEATURES:

‚Ä¢‚ÄÉEasy-to-use food icons for logging your daily macros.
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉBarcode scanner with an extensive 500,000 food database for quickly adding foods.
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉTake daily private before and after selfies to motivate your progress. Share them with friends when you're ready.
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉTrack your progress overtime and easily change your daily goals.
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉSync between devices for free.
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉFood bank conserves calories for special events.
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉCreate custom foods and meals that will show up on your daily Food Grid.
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉSet up warnings for when you approach your macros limits
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉHelpful reminders for logging your daily macros.
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉChange your portion sizes on the fly.
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉAutomatically convert to metrics with the touch of a button
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉClean layout for reviewing your daily foods and adding daily notes
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉDaily water tracker
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉEmail your food history to anyone you'd like.

Try it today, it‚Äôs free to download! You have nothing to lose but the fat! Brought to you by the developers of Stupid Simple Keto, the popular and easy-to-use Keto diet tracker.

recentChanges: This update includes a number of bug fixes and performance improvements based on feedback from our loyal users. By popular request we've also added new lower cost purchase options that come with a free 3 day trial. As always you can still purchase a lifetime premium membership and never pay recurring fees. This update fixes some minor bugs.
comments: One month after android 11 update and the keyboard bug still exists. Keyboard does not come up trying to search. Recommendation after I gave feedback was to downgrade to android 10, really?!? Not really a solution in my books and a month is too long without an update required for compatibility. I just feel stuck as this has a lot of my journey stored here but would not recommend at this point in time.

I really like the simplistic idea behind this app, but fact like basic foods like raisins and quark are missing, and there's no food search function (you have swipe to find the right item), makes it difficult to commit to it. Even though I like the food icons and thr cute visuals, UI is way too cluttered. Finally, measurements are not always consistent in each food (eg. No gram unit available in all foods). I'd be happy to try this app on it's next iterations to see if they fixed these points.

I had given this 5 stars. I even paid for the premium version in 2017. But then there was an update, and the premium version stopped. The ads have returned and the app lost some functionality. I'm not going to keep paying for new premium versions after every update.
Great free version that is a good guide to tracking your macros. Not an exact measurement but close enough to be very useful.

Great app! Takes a bit to figure out how to navigate thru it, but that's the way it is with all apps. I'm not doing keto, but still tracking my macros. I have lost 5 lbs (maybe some water weight, but i have increased my H2O intake) in a week because I am aware of what I am eating, thanks to this app. Well worth the $25.

title: BEST FOOD 4 YOUR BLOOD TYPE
description:
Introducing Best Food for your Blood Type apps. Blood type Diet at your fingertips ‚Äì a quick, concise, and easy references inspired by Dr. Peter J. D‚ÄôAdamo‚Äôs from his Bestselling books ‚ÄúEat Right 4 your Blood Type‚Äù. D‚ÄôAdamo claims that by eating-and limiting-certain food based on your blood type, you‚Äôll harness your body‚Äôs natural ability to digest nutrients, burn fat, fight inflammation, and achieve overall health and wellness. 

‚ÄúResearch indicates that your blood type is a key genetic factor that influences many areas of health and well-being‚Äù ‚Äì D‚ÄôAdamo.

Thus, this apps created to provide handy references for grocery shopping, meal planning, or even eating in the restaurants. Easy to use. Simply select your blood type and click food categories provided for your references. 

Best food 4 your Blood Type features includes:
-	Easy and concise food list (indicators for food that are divided by most beneficial, food allowed, and food to avoid are according to colours).
-	List of food according to categories ( Meats & Poultry, Seafood, Dairy, Fats & Oils, Nuts, Vegetables, Beans, Grains, Breads & Noodles, Fruits, Spices, Condiments and Beverages).
-	About: Brief Description of each blood type diet.
-	Guide: User guidelines for these apps / Privacy Policies / Disclaimer
-	FAQ: List of Frequent Ask Questions about the Blood Type Diet.

Disclaimer: 
All of the information and photos in this application is not our trademark. We only get the information and photo from the search engines and websites. Please let us know if your original content or photo want to be remove from our application. Please do not hesitate to E-mail us for further enquiry. Thank you.

Important notes:
The choice of following this diet must be made at your own risk. Please consult your doctor if needed.

- FAQ: List of Frequent Ask Questions about the Blood Type Diet.

Disclaimer:
All of the information and photos in this application is not our trademark. We only get the information and photo from the search engines and websites. Please let us know if your original content or photo want to be remove from our application. Please do not hesitate to E-mail us for further enquiry. Thank you.

Important notes:
The choice of following this diet must be made at your own risk. Please consult your doctor if needed.

Version 1.9

Handy for grocery shopping, meal planning or even eating in the restaurant.

comments: they weren't kidding about the ads! everything was pre-empted by an ad for a horrible game of some sort and then the content itself wasn't helpful
Great medical feat, which enhances bodyguards, because your blood is everything you have. That's what makes the body function. Thanks for sharing
Aweful. Advertisements every time you choose an option
It's so helpful making me to eat what my body really need well and be refreshed.
This App is great to use as a simple guide while Grocery Shopping.

title: Gluten By Numbers 2
description:
Find yourself wondering if that additive contains GLUTEN? Save yourself time and stress with this popular application! Simply type in the E Number or Additive on the food label and find out INSTANTLY if that food product if safe for you. A simple to use Gluten Free App, made by a Celiac for Celiacs.

By downloading this application you agree that this application is only a guide and is not intended as medical advice.  Any dietary health concerns may have should be discussed with a registered dietitian or physician.

summary: Find yourself wondering if that additive contains GLUTEN?
comments: I have yet to see an ingredient list that shows what the "number" is for a particular ingredient. You can only search by number and the list in the app isn't even alphabetically listed. How can anyone give this 5 stars?
This app is a must have for celiacs!
Only a number keypad is persented when trying to search .  would like to be able to search by name .
Best additive gluten checker out there!

title: Was ich esse
description:
Das kann die App:

Mit der App ‚ÄûWas ich esse‚Äú kann ich festhalten, was und wie viel ich den Tag √ºber gegessen und getrunken habe. Der Produktkatalog enth√§lt √ºber 700 Lebensmittel und Speisen mit Bildern. Falls trotzdem etwas fehlt, kann ich es selbst fotografieren, einen Namen geben und es hinzuf√ºgen ‚Äì nat√ºrlich erscheint das neue Produkt nur auf meinem pers√∂nlichen Smartphone.
Die ‚Äûeingecheckten‚Äú Lebensmittel werden automatisch in die Ern√§hrungspyramide des BZfE einsortiert und in ein Wochenprotokoll √ºbertragen; denn nicht jeder Tag muss perfekt sein, sondern die Woche z√§hlt. 

Ich entscheide selbst, ob ich mich an den wissenschaftlichen Empfehlungen der Ern√§hrungspyramide orientiere oder eigene Schwerpunkte setze. Wenn ich bestimmte Lebensmittel oft zu essen vergesse, kann ich mich daran erinnern lassen. 
Meine individuelle Ern√§hrungspyramide kann ich √ºber facebook und twitter posten und teilen.
Was die App sonst noch macht? Finde es heraus!


Was ist die Ern√§hrungspyramide des BZfE?

Die Ern√§hrungspyramide ist ein einfaches und alltagstaugliches Modell, mit dem jeder sein Ess- und Trinkverhalten pr√ºfen und optimieren kann. Sie ist wissenschaftlich abgesichert und ber√ºcksichtigt den eigenen Geschmack und individuelle Gewohnheiten. 
Die Ern√§hrungspyramide zeigt, welche Mengen pro Tag von den einzelnen Lebensmitteln empfohlen werden. Sie besteht aus Bausteinen und ist in drei farbige Ebenen unterteilt. Die Ampelfarben zeigen, ob die Lebensmittel reichlich, m√§√üig oder in geringen Mengen gegessen oder getrunken werden k√∂nnen. Jeder Baustein steht f√ºr eine Portion. Die Portionen werden mit den H√§nden abgemessen.  

Die App arbeitet mit dem Handma√ü als Portionenmodell; das hei√üt kein Kalorienz√§hlen und kein aufw√§ndiges Abwiegen. Was kompakt ist und in eine Hand passt, entspricht einer Portion, zum Beispiel ein Apfel. Kleinst√ºckige oder zerkleinerte Lebensmittel, wie Brokkolir√∂schen, werden mit zwei H√§nden zur Schale geformt abgemessen. Das Portionenmodell, aber auch die Ern√§hrungspyramide und die einzelnen Lebensmittelmittelgruppen werden in der App mit vielen Abbildungen erl√§utert. 


Wer ist das BZfE?

Das Bundeszentrum f√ºr Ern√§hrung, kurz BZfE, ist eine Abteilung der Bundesanstalt f√ºr Landwirtschaft und Ern√§hrung, einer nachgeordneten Beh√∂rde des Bundesministeriums f√ºr Ern√§hrung und Landwirtschaft. 

Feedback senden Sie bitte an: app@aid.de

recentChanges: Fehlerkorrektur
comments: Grunds√§tzlich eine gute App. Sie ist allerdings nicht sehr spezifisch, aber daf√ºr ist sie auch nicht gemacht. Es geht darum einen groben √úberblick zu gewinnen, und als Hilfestellung, was man zu viel oder zu wenig zu sich nimmt. Daf√ºr ist sie wirklich gut gemacht. title: ToxFox: BUND-Produktcheck
description:
Schadstoffe aufsp√ºren, Gesundheit sch√ºtzen und Hersteller unter Druck setzen: Mit der kostenlosen ToxFox-App des BUND e.V. wirst Du selbst zur Sp√ºrnase und setzt ein Zeichen f√ºr mehr Transparenz und bessere Produkte!

In unserem Alltag kommen wir mit zahlreichen Produkten in Kontakt, die gesundheitssch√§dliche Chemikalien enthalten k√∂nnen. Der BUND hat mit dem ToxFox einen Produktcheck entwickelt, der Dir hilft, Alltagsprodukte vor dem Kauf auf Schadstoffe zu pr√ºfen.  Hormonell wirksame Parabene im Duschgel? Fortpflanzungssch√§dliche Weichmacher im Schulranzen? Einfach den Strichcode scannen und Auskunft erhalten ‚Äì oder vom Hersteller einholen!

Der Kosmetikcheck 
Barcode scannen ‚Äì Schadstoffe erkennen. Der ToxFox gibt Dir Auskunft √ºber mehr als 80.000 K√∂rperpflegeprodukte. Und Du kannst Ver√§nderung bewirken: Schicke direkt von Deinem Android Phone eine Protestmail an den Hersteller. Je mehr VerbraucherInnen mitmachen, desto h√∂her der Druck auf Hersteller ‚Äì und desto eher werden sie Schadstoffe aus ihrer Kosmetik verbannen.

Stell die Giftfrage!
Ob Federmappe, Fahrradgriff oder Faschingskost√ºm: Tests weisen immer wieder sch√§dliche Chemikalien in Kinderprodukten nach. Die Schadstoffe k√∂nnen sich im K√∂rper anreichern und langfristig zu Erkrankungen wie Diabetes, Krebs oder Unfruchtbarkeit f√ºhren. Deshalb setzen wir mit dem ToxFox auf Pr√§vention! So einfach geht‚Äôs: Scanne den Strichcode auf der Verpackung mit der Android Phone-Kamera. Liegen bereits Infos zu sch√§dlichen Inhaltsstoffen vor, werden diese sofort angezeigt. Ansonsten hei√üt es aktiv werden: Mit dem ToxFox kannst Du direkt beim Herstellern nachfragen, ob das Produkt Schadstoffe enth√§lt. Dieser ist gesetzlich verpflichtet innerhalb von 45 Tagen zu antworten. Die Infos landen bei Dir und in unserer Datenbank ‚Äì wo sie f√ºr alle VerbraucherInnen sofort sichtbar sind. Der ToxFox wird so immer schlauer ‚Äì und mit ihm seine NutzerInnen. Eine einfache Frage, die doppelt wirkt. Hersteller begreifen: Produkte sollen frei von Schadstoffen sein! Und belastete Produkte werden zu Ladenh√ºtern. 


ToxFox unterst√ºtzen 
√úber eine Million Menschen nutzen den ToxFox des BUND e.V. - kostenfrei. So soll es bleiben. Unterst√ºtze unsere Arbeit mit einer Spende: https://spenden.bund.net/toxfox/ 

Datenschutz-Hinweis
ToxFox benutzt einen Webanalysedienst mit dem wir auswerten, wie die App von den NutzerInnen angenommen wird. Mit der Nutzung der App erkl√§ren Sie sich damit einverstanden.

Die durch den Analysedienst erhobenen statistischen Daten helfen uns dabei, unser Angebot kontinuierlich zu verbessern. Die erzeugten Informationen werden in der Regel an einen Server unseres Dienstleisters in den USA √ºbertragen und dort gespeichert. Im Auftrag des BUND werden diese Informationen benutzt, um die Nutzung der App auszuwerten, um Reports √ºber die App-Aktivit√§ten zusammenzustellen und um weitere mit der App-Nutzung verbundene Dienstleistungen gegen√ºber dem BUND zu erbringen. N√§here Informationen zu den Nutzungs- und Datenschutzbedingungen finden Sie unter
www.bund.net/toxfox-impressum

*** Feedback, Probleme, Fragen? ***
Mailen Sie uns: chem@bund.net

ToxFox-Website des BUND: www.bund.net/toxfox

comments: It would be nice if an alternative to the scanned, toxic product is shown

Wichtige App, Suche leider sehr aufwendig, wenn man ohne scannen in einer Produktliste suchen will. Bitte zeigt die groben Produktinfos schon in den Suchergebnisse (Liste). sobald man ein Produkt ausw√§hlt, kommt man leider nicht wieder zur√ºck zur der Liste der Suchergebnissen(warum nicht?). Beispiel Um 10 Sonnencremes zu vergleichen muss ich 10 Mal: 1) nach 'Sonnencremes' suchen 2) Produkt ausw√§hlen 3) zur√ºck zur suchliste 4) zur√ºck zur Sucheingabe 5) erneut nach sonnencreme suchen etc...

Gute App, nur leider ist die Datenbank nicht up to date, habe gerade eine Unbedenklich-Meldung f√ºr ein Produkt erhalten, das Lilial (Butylphenyl Methylproprional) enth√§lt. Und das ist laut App-Beschreibung ein bedenklicher Inhaltsstoff. Gegencheck mit einer anderen App empfehlenswert, daher nur 3 Sterne.
Tut, was sie soll. Infos √ºber Mikroplastik w√§ren noch super.

Does not warn about Oxybenzone that's the ingredient in most of sunscreens. 
How about you make a feature where users can submit a harmful ingredient 
even if it's not listes and toxfox marks it as "safe" ??

title: Natural Remedies: healthy life, food and beauty
description:
Love nature and find in nature your wellness. The health app for your healthy life, with healthy recipes, healthy food, herbal teas, health tips for natural beauty and skincare. But it does not end here, in fact you can also read lot of recipes of natural cosmetics and the latest news from science about nutrition and healthy natural life.

Toothache, insomnia, acne as well as nausea are just some of the illnesses that can be treated with natural methods without the overuse of medicines. Nature can be really a useful help.

Natural remedies such as herbal tea, essential oils, mother tinctures, antiwrinkle natural cosmetics and glycerin macerate act slowly, require patience but they can be very helpful and do not have the collateral effects related to medicines.

This health app, easy and fast, is a handbook of the natural remedies for the most common diseases, a book of healthy recipes, a place where you can find tips for a healthy life, for your skincare, to get healthy and stay healthy

The app for your natural wellness is structured as follows:

NATURAL REMEDIES
A list of plants, fruits and essential oils with explanations about uses, properties and benefits.

PROBLEMS AND DISEASES
List of the most common illnesses (allergy, poor digestion, acne, joint pain,  nausea, anxiety, wrinkles and much more) with the related natural remedies.

HEALTHY RECIPES & HEALTHY DIET & HEALTHY FOOD
Every week one healthy recipe to keep you fit and healthy with taste. Enjoy the yummy healthy food.

YOGA EXERSICES
For the flexibility of the body and the calm of mind. Yoga for the back, for the sciatica, to detox the body, for beginners and advanced.

HEALTHY NEWS FROM SCIENCE
Last news from science world: the most recent scientific studies about lifestyle, wellness, nutrition and health are reported.

SMALL NATURAL TIPS & TRICKS
Small and health tips and tricks for every day: short video tutorials that show you how to prepare at home simple natural remedies and natural cosmetics for your skincare and beauty, antiwrinkle lotions, lip gloss for cracked lips, golden milk, remedy for swollen legs.

CRHOMOTHERAPY
This section is based on the color-method to induce relax before bed. 

RELAX AREA
Enjoy the nature with sounds and calming music to relax your mind and body. 


Some topics that you can find on the app Natural Remedies are: information and application about Aloe Vera, how to prepare the Golden Milk, but also the green tee Matcha. You can read also the properties of turmeric, find out the essential oils that you can use against anxiety or depression. Do you have friends for lunch? Maybe you can find interesting the cake without butter or the healthy recipes for every day. In addition to this, you can also learn how to prepare DIY beauty cosmetics also in case of acne or wrinkles. Finally you can learn about eye health tips, healthy eating tips or healthy hair tips



Disclaimer
This app is not a substitute for professional medical or health advice, examination, diagnosis, or treatment. This app disclaims any liability for the decisions you make based on this information.

recentChanges:
- From science section improved
- Navigation improved
- Performance improved
- Minor bugs fixed
comments: The music, relaxation and meditation portion with the various styles of sound and music choices is phenomenal. I have anxiety issues and I didn't have any idea how much it would help. I love this option of the app but there's so much more. The health, healthy diet alternatives, natural remedies, wow, life changing info in this app! And it was like every day there was something new to find out. Love it!!
Very informative. Especially since the pandemic and the medication(s) abuse going on in our society. Being able to find natural remedies is a godsend. I also have found a medicinal plant app too.
I love how you can type in a sickness or cold or sore leg muscles & it will bring up a bunch of different remedies to try. A very easy & clear app love it üíï

This is an amazing app. It literally tells u all kinds of home made natural remedies and recipes u can use or make to use. For me, I've been having trouble with acne and it gave me a huge list with good detailing on what I need, and how to use it, and how to make it. It's not just for acne though. Upset stomach, in general just wanting to b healthy. It's a great app. At least for me it is. It's worth it to check out if ur into stuff like this

The site is amazing from A to Z and then some. It goes far beyond my expectations, especially considering it's free! It's a plethora of information ! Not to mention the advertisements are minimal and not intrusive ! 100% recommend this app

title: FoodMaestro
descriptionHTML:
FoodMaestro was founded with a simple mission‚Ä¶ to help consumers answer one simple question: ‚ÄúCan I eat this?‚Äù

If you suffer from a food allergy, or food intolerance or have a specific food diet lifestyle, our award winning app is here to help you find products that are suitable for you quickly and easily.

Check ingredients, nutrition or products notes from expert dieticians and clinical experts both private and NHS.

With over 120,000 UK products across most major retailers, foodmaestro app helps you determine if the chosen product is suitable for your allergy and helps you find new foods that are relevant to your lifestyle of dietary choice.

You can also use the app to creating shopping list, like your favorite free from allergy products. We are constantly updating our filters to include new range of criteria including Gluten-Free, Vegan, Halal, Dairy Free Lactose Intolerant, Sugarwise approved, etc.
With one free account you can manage the allergy, intolerance or dietary lifestyle of you entire family. The app will indicate the suitability of a product for each individual person and also help you find a product suitable for everyone where one exists in the market place.

Use the app in store when shopping or at home when you are validating a product for someone suffering from an allergy or has a specific dietary condition.
You should always read the label before purchasing or consuming a product, especially if you have a life-threatening allergy. The app is a guide to help you narrow down the list quickly but NO app should be used as replacement and guarantee for such conditions.

Key features;

Create your personal dietary profile;
Create a dietary profile for each person in your family;
Scan a barcode to determine suitability;
Search for suitable products in categories;
Store products to you favorites;
Create and manage your shopping list;
See expert notes from dieticians (NHS and Private);

For terms see http://www.foodmaestro.me/terms

WARNING: This application and the information that it contains do NOT constitute medical advice and should NOT serve as the basis for any medical decision by you or anyone else. Please consult with your doctor or dietitian should you have questions regarding information on any product identified as suitable by this application. We always recommend you read the product label before consuming any product.
summary: Can I eat this? answer this simple question for your allergy, intolerance , diet
developerAddress: Apple Barn, Langley Park, Sutton Road, Maidstone, Kent, ME17 3NQ
recentChanges: Minor issue fixes
comments: This app was suggested to me by my son's nurse and has been so helpful as I learn my dairy free lifestyle for us both (bf). A bit glitchy but considering its a free app, I'm not complaining at all! Im overjoyed with it, often scrolling for ideas during the night feeds!

Just installed this because a nurse told me that it might help so I gave it a try.i just tested it on a around 5 items I had in my kitchen and it worked great for 4 of them but on the last one it said it DIDN'T CONTAIN PEANUTS BUT IT DID so this app is ok but not great and if you choose to use it always always always double check after. if I did eat that food item I would be dead after a few minutes so be safe and double check everytime.
Brilliant app. Helps me so much with food allergies. Highly recommend it!
Downloaded the app, went through the registration process, got the confirmation email, clicked on the confirmation link, can't login, several attempts.
Need a bit more in-depth intolerances to choose from re fodmaps. But good so far. Like the barcode scanner.

title: WebMD: Check Symptoms, Rx Savings, & Find Doctors
description:
** Coronavirus / COVID-19 Outbreak: Tap the card on our home screen for the latest updates on the 2020 coronavirus outbreak. **

From WebMD, the one healthcare app you need to check symptoms; learn about conditions and drugs; research treatments and diagnoses; find doctors and specialists in your area; get Rx discounts available at your local pharmacy; and set medication reminders. 

Key Features: 

‚Ä¢ Symptom Checker ‚Äì Choose your symptoms, learn about potential conditions or issues, and lookup treatment and care options.
‚Ä¢ Doctor Directory ‚Äì Find the closest doctors and specialists based on your current location or search by city, state or zip. 
‚Ä¢ WebMD Rx ‚Äì We partner with major pharmacy chains to find the lowest prescription drug prices, which often beat insurance co-pays. It‚Äôs 100% free to use. No registration required.
‚Ä¢ Medication Reminders ‚Äì Never miss a dose. You‚Äôll receive reminders when it‚Äôs time to take your medications. View daily prescription schedules and instructions, plus pill images with dosage and timing information for each drug. 
‚Ä¢ Conditions ‚Äì Find medically-reviewed information about conditions relevant to you and learn more about causes, treatments, and related symptoms. 
‚Ä¢ Customization and Saving Functionality ‚Äì Save your conditions, drugs, doctors, hospitals, pharmacies, and healthy living articles for secure, easy access and reference. 
‚Ä¢ Drug Interaction Checker ‚Äì Find and identify potentially harmful and unsafe combinations of prescription medications by entering two or more drugs in question.

ABOUT WebMD
WebMD Health Corp. (Nasdaq: WBMD) is the leading provider of health information services, serving consumers, physicians, healthcare professionals, employers, and health plans through our public and private online portals, mobile platforms and health-focused publications. More than 95 million unique visitors access the WebMD Health Network each month.

If you are a California resident, California law may provide you with certain rights regarding our use of your personal information. For more information relevant to our users who are California residents, please review the "California Residents" section of our Privacy Policy linked on this download page or within our app.

The WebMD Health Network includes WebMD Health, Medscape, MedicineNet, emedicineHealth, RxList, theheart.org, drugs.com and Medscape Education.
SOURCE WebMD Health Corp.

WebMD. Better Information. Better Health.
WebMD does not provide medical advice, diagnosis or treatment. Always seek the advice of your physician or other qualified health provider with any questions you may have regarding a medical condition. Never disregard professional medical advice or delay in seeking it because of something you have read on the WebMD mobile application.

recentChanges:
Introducing Profile.
All your saved health information is now stored in your profile.
- Save your doctors‚Äô contact information so it‚Äôs always on hand.
- Save Rx coupons for easy access at the pharmacy. Just show the Pharmacist the coupon on your phone, and save on prescriptions.
- All of your saved articles, drugs and conditions in one convenient place.
- See an overview of all your medication reminders.
comments: I have found that searching for certain terms, such as "dementia", will get no hits inside the app but will get plenty of hits on the WebMD website. I would say that about one-third of the time when I search for a condition or anasic keyword that obviously should get results, I get no results at all. So it would appear that the app does not have access to all of the content found on the Web MD website. To me, this means there is really no point in using the app.

A great resource for all things health and medical-related. I use the symptom checker feature the most, but the app also features articles on health conditions, information on different medications, and COVID articles. Definitely a great resource, and completely free!
This is such an app for info on medical anything. Including identifying pills that you find in your cabinet and can't remember or know what it is.

I've had and trusted the app for years, but about 2 months ago it suddenly started regularly spamming me with notifications with Corona news... Mostly scary and negative stories about people being reinfected, death and about immunization trials being cancelled by johnson and johnson due to safety concerns etc.... WHY ARE YOU SPAMMING ME WITH MORE FEAR MONGERING DON'T WE HAVE ENOUGH FEAR IN OUR LIVES!?!? I'm so furious. Sit on my phone and keep quiet until I need you. Notifications disabled
The drug interaction checker not working properly. Says it found 2 interactions but only describes 1.Shows it found 3 interactions but only describes 2...and so on.

title: Meal Planner for Weight Loss & Healthy Recipes
description:
Our Meal Planner for Weight Loss & Healthy Recipes App provide a simple way for busy singles, couples, and families to plan their meals and eat healthier. Our healthy Meal Planner for Weight Loss & healthy recipes are highly customizable so you can easily personalize a plan that works with your unique tastes and lifestyle.

Reasons you will love this app

‚úî 3 delicious healthy recipes for free for quick cooking, every day
‚úî Varied free healthy recipes 
‚úî Awesome Meal Planner for Weight Loss
‚úî Step-by-step photo tutorials to make sure each dish is foolproof
‚úî Save your favorite recipes in your personal list to cook them later
‚úî Quickly find the right dish with a recipe filter
‚úî Share your favorite recipes with friends
‚úî Find the nearest grocery store on the integrated map
‚úî Create a shopping list of several recipes, including prices
‚úî Portion calculator and nutritional information
‚úî Free cooking app

We offer to you a lot of weight loss recipes: main dishes weight loss recipes, snack weight loss recipes, salad weight loss recipes, soup weight loss recipes, sweet weight loss recipes, juice and freches weight loss recipes, low carb meat, low carb fish, low carb chicken, low fat casseroles, low carb breakfast, weight loss baking, weight loss pizza and other weight loss recipes.

All weight loss recipes are presented with simple and detailed instructions and photo.

Sign up to Recipes of the Day and join over 1,000,000 people who have used our Meal Planner for Weight Loss to eat healthier, reduce stress, lose weight, save money, and live happier, more productive lives.

Check out our top 5 benefits and features:

1. Cook healthy meals in about 30 minutes or less (even if you don't know how to cook)
We've reimagined and streamlined the cooking experience. Prepare meals quickly with our step-by-step and hassle-free cooking instructions.

You'll never again have to jump around looking for an ingredient, instruction, or piece of cookware that you may have overlooked.

2. No more stressful "What should I eat?" decisions to make
Each week you'll have a personalized meal plan with simple & healthy recipes that are catered to your exact needs and preferences.

Eliminate decision fatigue after a long day's work - simply pick a recipe from your meal plan and cook it in less time than it takes to pick up an unhealthy (and expensive) takeout meal.

3. Healthy meal plans that are uniquely your own
With the most personalization options of any minimal-waste meal planner out there, you can cook exactly how you want to eat.

From classic, flexitarian, pescetarian, low carb, paleo, keto, vegetarian & vegan diet types to gluten-free, shellfish free, fish free, dairy free, peanut free, tree nut free, soy free, egg free, sesame free, and mustard free allergy restrictions to 119 individual dislikable ingredients, your meal plans will be truly personalized to your specific needs.

4. Optimized & super fast grocery lists
When you build a new meal plan, a grocery list of all the ingredients you'll need for the week is automatically created. Simply grab your mobile, head to the grocery store, and get all your week's shopping done in about 20 minutes with our step-by-step grocery list optimized with standard grocery store layouts in mind.

5. Save money with minimal food waste
It's annoying when you purchase ingredients from the grocery store, cook a meal or two, and have a bunch of ingredients going bad by the end of the week, isn't it?

comments: WORTHLESS! This is not a free app. It is not a meal "planner" its a sales pitch. Dont bother with it. You CANNOT make a shopping list for a week and the recipes require 10 or more ingredients each and are ridiculus to prepare. As a dad its not made for a family its for single women with a bunch of money and spare time to shop daily. WORTHLESS!
I like that you don't have to subscribe - big plus. The meals and recipes are readily varied.

I see a title for shopping list on the home page as well as a grocery cart but when I click on it it goes to the Meal Plan page. And there are 41 things on my list which I would like to see. If the grocery list doesn't work I want my money back!
Downloaded app to find out you have to pay 12 dollars to use it. Its only 12.00 but why list it as a free app ?
Great app for healthy cooking üòç

title: Gi BodyGuard from the CDHF
description:
The more health information you provide to your physician, the better care you will receive. Gi BodyGuard, developed by experts at the Canadian Digestive Health Foundation (www.CDHF.ca), is a free, easy to use app that allows you to track information about your health, symptoms, medications, food and exercise.  


Who uses Gi BodyGuard?

Gi BodyGuard caters to people with a multitude of digestive health issues including IBS, IBD (Crohns and Ulcerative Colitis), Celiac Disease, Lactose Intolerance, GERD, Acid Reflux, Diarrhea and Constipation, among others. 


What can Gi BodyGuard do for me?

Gi BodyGuard empowers you to track vital health information. With a few quick clicks, you can quickly, easily and privately create an extensive, up-to-the-minute summary of your digestive health history to share with your health care team. Armed with critical information about you, they can recognize trends that may indicate a change in your health status, make the best diagnosis, and provide informed care to help you feel better.


Use Gi BodyGuard to track:

‚Ä¢ Stool frequency and consistency
‚Ä¢ Presence and type of blood in stool
‚Ä¢ Symptoms you experience
‚Ä¢ Pain location and severity
‚Ä¢ Medications 
‚Ä¢ Your medical history
‚Ä¢ Food and liquids intake
‚Ä¢ Exercise (cardio, strength training and stretching)
‚Ä¢ Weight

Gi BodyGuard also allows you to set reminders for taking medications and renewing your prescriptions. Whether you are dealing with a short term or chronic illness, these are important for regaining and maintaining your good health.


ABOUT THE CDHF

The Canadian Digestive Health Foundation (CDHF) helps reduce suffering and improve quality of life by empowering people like you with trusted, up to date, science-based information about digestive health and disease. As the Foundation of the Canadian Association of Gastroenterology, we work directly with leading physicians, scientists, and other health care professionals to help you understand and take control of your digestive health with confidence and optimism. In addition to developing Gi BodyGuard, the foundation offers a robust suite of educational information, programs and events to those looking to improve their digestive -- and overall -- health. You can learn more at www.CDHF.ca.

recentChanges:
- NEW ability to add notes to each log item
- more options for medication value ("pills", "tbsp", "tsp")
- more options to symptoms list ("fatigue", "psoriasis")
- minor bug fixes
comments: I tried putting in my weight, and while it shows "kg" as the measurement, when you look at the log, it shows "lb". Can you please fix this...and maybe add the option of switching to lb or kg, depending on preference. AND you cant remove it if you make a mistake!  And...when you try to send comments directly to them...the email address is invalid!!  I'm losing faith in this app... Please fix...Thanks.

App has lots of potential, but lots of problems. It's easy to log food, meds, stools, symptoms. However, the food database is very small and while it's easy to add foods I was adding multiple foods per day, every day. The med list is more complete but isn't searchable, and has spelling errors (falgyl). Worst, there's no way to go back and edit logs, or delete if you make a mistake. Also was really hoping the app would correlate symptoms to foods... It doesn't.

I was really excited to learn that the CDHF created an app to log activity related to digestive disorder for Canadians.   However; my excitement soon turned to frustration in using this app.  There's no edit button,  once you log your entries it is written in stone.  You can't go back and make any changes.   Furthermore; on logging your meals, if you don't choose an item from the predetermined list and just make an entry via the 'Add Notes' , and attempt to log, the app will crash.

Useful as but the inability to make any changes or delete incorrect entries makes it frustrating to use.  Also the previous meals options are buggy - often what I select isn't what shows on the screen.
This app is great. Tracks a ton of information I can share with my doctor. Quick.  Easy. Love the reports and notes features.

title: Centr, by Chris Hemsworth
description:
WHAT IS CENTR?
Whatever your goal, age, sex or fitness level, this app will help you get it done with guidance from the world‚Äôs best trainers, chefs and well-being experts. And it‚Äôs all tailored to you; your goal, fitness level and diet preferences. It‚Äôs your PT, dietician, chef and wellness coach all in one app. 
 
It‚Äôs not a diet. It‚Äôs not a boot camp. It‚Äôs not just weight loss, either. There are meal plans and snacks you‚Äôll actually love, workouts and programs you‚Äôll look forward to, and practical techniques to keep your head in the game.
 
WHAT DO YOU GET?
Your weekly planner is the heart of Centr. Scroll through your week, or swipe to swap activities. Get new workouts, recipes and life hacks weekly. Simple to use and easy to follow.
NEW Dedicated programs section: Breathe new life into your training routine with our time-based workout programs. Currently in session:

- Centr Unleashed ‚Äì our 6 week bodyweight program where the only equipment you need‚Ä¶ is you! Perfect if you‚Äôre training from home or don‚Äôt have access to any equipment.

- Centr 6 ‚Äì our 6 week program inspired by Chris‚Äôs favorite way to train on the road. 6 exercises, 6 rounds, 6 days a week for 6 weeks!

New programs will be continually added to your programs section!
 
Daily workout videos: HIIT, boxing, strength, MMA, HIRT, functional training, Pilates, yoga and more! Log your goal and set intensity from beginner to advanced. Train at home or in the gym, whenever, wherever with 20-40 minute workouts.
 
Easy, healthy meal plans: gluten-free, vegetarian, vegan, pescatarian or regular; take your pick! Swap recipes, add to your shopping list and adjust servings to feed more.
 
Calming mindfulness: clear your head through guided meditations, get quality rest with sleep visualizations, and use expert tips and techniques to stress less.

MEET THE TEAM
Follow the Centr lifestyle to train, eat and feel better with these experts (& more):

- Luke Zocchi: Chris Hemsworth‚Äôs personal trainer
- Joseph Sakoda AKA ‚ÄòDa Rulk‚Äô: Special Ops trainer
- Ashley Joi: Cardio & strength trainer
- Sylvia Roberts: Pilates instructor
- Tahl Rinsky: Dynamic yoga instructor
- Bobby Holland Hanton: Hollywood stuntman
- Torre Washington: Vegan bodybuilder
- Dan Churchill: Cookbook author & nutrition coach
- Simon Hill: Plant-based foods podcaster
- Jorge ‚ÄòThe Spaniard‚Äô Blanco: Boxing & MMA coach
- Gunnar Peterson: Strength & endurance director
- Michael Olajide Jr.: Boxing champion & supermodel trainer
- Dr. Eric Goodman: Creator of Foundation Training
- Alexis Naim: Holistic psychotherapist
- Sergio Perera: Michelin-trained chef
- Ally Bogard:Yoga & meditation teacher
- Fabrice Midal: Leading French meditation teacher

And of course, Chris Hemsworth himself. You‚Äôre here to build muscle, lose weight, or get fitter. They‚Äôre here to help you get it done.

Centr can use HealthKit with Apple Watch to log your workout, record your heart rate and active energy. Don‚Äôt worry, we‚Äôll ask for permission before we do this.

SUBSCRIBERS AUTOMATIC-RENEWAL FEATURE 
1, 3, 12 month subscriptions available.

Payment will be charged to your credit card through our website at confirmation of purchase. Subscription renews automatically unless cancelled at least 24 hours prior to the end of the subscription period. There is no increase in price when renewing. Subscriptions can be managed via our website and auto-renewal turned off in Account Settings. Once purchased, refunds will not be provided for any unused portion of the term.

Read full Terms of Service & Privacy Policy: https://centr.com/article/show/5293/privacy-policy & https://centr.com/article/show/5294/terms-and-conditions

- Fabrice Midal: Leading French meditation teacher

And of course, Chris Hemsworth himself. You‚Äôre here to build muscle, lose weight, or get fitter. They‚Äôre here to help you get it done.

Centr can use HealthKit with Apple Watch to log your workout, record your heart rate and active energy. Don‚Äôt worry, we‚Äôll ask for permission before we do this.

SUBSCRIBERS AUTOMATIC-RENEWAL FEATURE
1, 3, 12 month subscriptions available.

Payment will be charged to your credit card through our website at confirmation of purchase. Subscription renews automatically unless cancelled at least 24 hours prior to the end of the subscription period. There is no increase in price when renewing. Subscriptions can be managed via our website and auto-renewal turned off in Account Settings. Once purchased, refunds will not be provided for any unused portion of the term.

Read full Terms of Service & Privacy Policy: https://centr.com/article/show/5293/privacy-policy & https://centr.com/article/show/5294/terms-and-conditions
summary: Workouts, recipes & meditations with Chris Hemsworth‚Äôs world-class team.
recentChanges: Been curious about what‚Äôs in a program workout before you get started? You can now get a preview from your progress screen.
comments: Worth every penny! I work full time in healthcare and take care of an active toddler with another kid on the way any day now. Needless to say carving out the time for a full fitness routine is a struggle. Thankfully Centr takes care of all the planning and tells you EXACTLY what to do and how to do it with an incredibly easy to use interface. They even get your kids involved with some of the activities. I've been at it 30 days now and def notice an improvement in muscle gain and overall health.

I thought that this app was a great way for me to try and bulk up my body. Definitely made me feel like I was striving for a new me. I only wish that this app would track your weight and do some before and after photos. Or it could definitely make some monthly or weekly progress notifications. Other than that. This app is definitely great. üëç

Totally recommend a subscription. There are SO many workouts to choose from with various levels of strength/endurance. I love that you can see how long the workout is and for many of the programs, you can see what exercises yoy will be doing ahead of time. Includes recipes too. Great value.
Excellent app. I'm not fit and I keep up with every exercises. Many different level options. Entertaining and fun coaches. I recommend it!

This app has great workouts and I have found the coached workouts are easy to follow. The recipes are fairly easy to follow and its improved my breakfast game. The reason it doesn't get five stars is because it's really lacking in personalization. It doesn't help you tract your weight or personalize the meal plan to your height/weight/gender/activity level. As is, the meal plan portion of the app is highly lacking for what you pay for the app. I do really love the workouts though.

title: Celiac recipes for healthy eating
description: Unfortunately, in the last few years celiac disease rates have skyrocketed all over the world. In this application we bring you recipes for celiacs, gluten-free dishes, bread without wheat, step by step you will learn recipes and healthy habits for these people. Receive guidance for a daily food without wheat. With natural products suitable for coeliacs that you can cook in your own home. You will find information for a celiac diet with easy to find ingredients with which you will make some menus suitable for the whole family, fried, cookies, bread, pasta. Because there are plenty of dishes without the need to use wheat. Only following a proper diet and eliminating the wheat, with hygiene advice a celiac person will not have complications or intestinal damage. You can eat everything. In addition you will find in these videos quantity of meals of expert chefs. The celiacs will enjoy a delicious gluten-free meal, which even they can cook themselves. We give you a list of wheat-free products for a good diet. With this app, eating without wheat will no longer be an excuse to savor a good dish.

title: Miiskin - Skin Cancer - Track and Check Moles
description:
SKIN AND MOLE TRACKER
Miiskin is your personal skin and mole checker app - a dermatology tool to help you take care and check for changes to your skin and moles.

Miiskin is the first online app to be dermatologically accredited by the derm / dermatologist accrediting organization, Skin Health Alliance.

MIISKIN HELPS YOU:
- Take photos and track individual moles for changes
- Easily log the tracked mole locations on a body map
- Get a reminder when it‚Äôs time to take a new photo
- Compare baseline and follow-up photos side-by-side
- See informational articles about melanoma and skin cancer

MIISKIN PREMIUM INCLUDES:
- Taking photos of large areas of your skin, like your back
- Extra secure PIN protection
- Examine your photos on bigger screens
- Skin mapping to help you look out for new moles or marks
- Easily transfer your account to a new phone

Miiskin is the most user friendly app for tracking and monitoring changes in your skin and moles. Take control of your concern and start keeping an eye on your skin.

MIISKIN DOES NOT PROVIDE A DIAGNOSIS

The app does not in any way diagnose your skin and moles or evaluate the risk of melanoma. The app is meant to assist you with tracking your moles and skin over time. We do not think that with today‚Äôs technology it is defensible to provide indications of melanoma or skin cancer risk in a mole. Therefore, we opt not to attempt this for now.

If you find a mole that looks concerning you should always consult a certified doctor and let him or her check your skin and moles for skin cancer or malignant melanoma.

THE VISION OF MIISKIN

Miiskin‚Äôs vision is to help its users to be on top of their concern and easily monitor skin and mole changes.

Help us fight melanoma and skin cancer. Tell your friends and family to start checking their skin for changes.

Write to support@miiskin.com for any help with the app.

Wish you the best,

Team Miiskin

recentChanges: If you have questions or problems, please write to support@miiskin.com - we will be glad to help.
comments: I think that this app is best from current available apps, but I very miss possibility to add more skin areas (for example side or some custom area like feet), not only 4 default, I houp you will implement that in near future
Had my phone reset and I can no longer use the basic version, have to pay. Plus I can't find the alleged exported photos other than being told they are on my phone's "hard drive" .
Not free. Crashed my phone. Couldn't find the app easily on phone to uninstall.

Great self monitoring app, highly recommended to keep track of which moles you've had. So when you go to your Dermatology appointment and they ask you if you've noticed a mole before, you'll be able to say "yes!", and they won't need to do a $300 biopsy if you're not sure of the duration of mole existence.

God app, makes you take care of yourself more and pay attention to little things and changes. Too bad you cannot share images. Re. Developer's response below: 1. This is not 1993 and email sharing is not most convenient. 2. Sharing images is not an indication to skip a doctor. You are trying to cover product limitation with false concerns but is actually sounds patronising.

title: Keto Diet app : Best Low Carb & Keto Recipes
description:
ketogenic diet : top recipes for weight loss : Enjoy preparing the best keto diet recipes and low carb diet dishes easily with top keto Diet Recipes app ! 

ketogenic diet : top recipes for weight loss app is a result of hard work, choosing the best and budget friendly keto / low carb recipes is not easy.Our goal is make your keto diet journey easier and more funny.

WHAT IS THE KETO DIET?

A keto diet is well known for being a low carb diet, where the body produces ketones in the liver to be used as energy. It‚Äôs referred to as many different names ‚Äì ketogenic diet, low carb diet, low carb high fat (LCHF), etc.

The Keto diet is a low carb diet, high-fat diet also known as a ketogenic diet , low carb high fat (LCHF), etc.In this diet our body produces ketones in the liver to be used as energy which makes it great for weight loss.besides, according to lot of studies, it helps control blood sugar, increase mental focus, improve triglyceride levels and cholesterol levels and reduce risk factors for diabetes, heart diseases, stroke, Alzheimer‚Äôs, epilepsy, and more!

WHY A  KETO DIET / LOW CARB  DIET?

WHY REDUCE CARBS?

We‚Äôre starting to understand that carbs in large quantities are much more harmful than previously thought, while most fats are healthy and essential (the basis of a low carb diet).

Low-carb diets have been controversial for decades. But times are changing, nowadays it is proven that not only does low carb cause weight loss, it also leads to major improvements in most risk factors (cancer , cholesterol, ‚Ä¶.)

The keto diet (low-carb diet) is becoming very known and getting accepted and it is only the beginning. Excess sugar and carbs relationship detrimental effects are no longer a secret.

Not to mention that eating lot of carbs causes increase of sugar level in blood and, as a result so in insulin. Insulin is known to cause heart diseases, high blood pressure and diabetes.

WHAT TO EXCPECT FROM A KETO DIET TRACKER?

‚Ä¢ Weight loss (fat is consumed)
‚Ä¢ Stable energy levels during the day
‚Ä¢ Mental focus
‚Ä¢ Stay satiated after meals longer, with less snacking and overeating


TOP LOW CARB & KETO RECIPES!

We choosed the best low carb recipes, easy to prepare and delicious meals that you will love and share .We hope that our keto recipes make you fell better live a better lifestyle .

Our app contains tens of low carb recipes for. The main goal of these low carb recipes is to:

‚Ä¢ Keep carbs low  
‚Ä¢ Increase your protein intake 
‚Ä¢ Keep you full and satiated from delicious meals.


TOP KETO DIET  RECIPES APP FEATURES:

‚Ä¢ Top keto diet recipes - more added every week.
‚Ä¢ Offline Reading - recipes are available without internet connection.
‚Ä¢ Search Section - so you can search the keto recipes you need.
‚Ä¢ Share Recipes - sharing with friends  is caring .
‚Ä¢ More features on the way (like a highly requested keto tracker ,  Low Carb Counter , ketogenic diet calculator)!

When you request a keto diet recipe details you may notice 4 small icons bellow recipe name:
the 1st :keto recipes preparation time
the 2nd :keto recipes cooking time
the 3rd : keto recipes numbr of servings
the 4th :keto recipes carbs quantity per 1 serving


WE ARE WORKING ON THE ‚Äú KETO DIET GUIDE ‚Äú:

In the next update we will add a keto guide for beginners to our app

‚Ä¢ What is the Keto Diet?
‚Ä¢ What to eat on a ketogenic diet
‚Ä¢ Types of Keto Diets
‚Ä¢ Side Effects on a Keto Diet
‚Ä¢ Long-term Benefits of the Ketogenic Diet
‚Ä¢ Diabetes and Ketoacidosis
‚Ä¢ Keto Flu
‚Ä¢ And more to get you on the path to weight loss and optimal health with the keto diet!

‚Ä¢ keto snacks 
‚Ä¢ keto desserts
‚Ä¢ ketogenic diet recipes
‚Ä¢ keto diet plan 
‚Ä¢ ketogenic diet foods.
‚Ä¢ keto meal plan
‚Ä¢ keto diet menu

The Top Keto Diet Recipes app is in its early stages and will see many improvements weekly.

Please feel free to send ideas,  kito recipes or feedback to support@ketodiet-app.me

Top Keto Diet Recipes app wishes you the best with your low carb journey.
